## About this website

I'm a senior studying Data Science at the University of California, Berkeley. 

At the Haas School of Business, I'm a member of Angus Hildreth's Social Psychology and Business Lab.

Having studied abroad in Taiwan during Spring 2023 and grown up in America, I understand English and Mandarin.

In high school, I was ranked top-50 in Lincoln-Douglas debate nationally.
